h2_title: How to Parry Enemy Attacks in Black Myth: Wukong
content: Each successful use of the Rock Solid spell will result in sparks flying and a "ching" sound, letting you know you've got it right and deflected. With lesser Yaoguais, parrying with Rock Solid will stagger them for a few seconds and leave them open to counterattacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Parry.md', within the main section titled 'How to Parry', specifically from the subsection 'How to Parry Enemy Attacks in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
Each successful use of the Rock Solid spell will result in sparks flying and a "ching" sound, letting you know you've got it right and deflected. With lesser Yaoguais, parrying with Rock Solid will stagger them for a few seconds and leave them open to counterattacks.
